comment: One of the best professors I've ever had doesn't make class miserably hard, but you also still learn a lot!

THE BEST MATH TEACHER I'VE EVER HAD. She is so sweet and makes learning math a breeze (which says a lot coming from me). She connects with her students and offered her class through teams if you couldn't make it so you didn't fall behind. She truly wants her students to pass and tries her best to make sure they do. I HIGHLY recommend her!
I love Professor B, She is the best professor I have ever had. She really cares about student success. I hated math before, but now I love statistics.
